text:
@NYGovCuomo .
We rank 41st in the world for testing rate per million

 FORTY FIRST!

This is why OUR DEATH RATE is in the TOP 10%

AND that's why REOPENING WILL BE A DISASTER until we start TESTING those W/O symptoms

In the private sector, CEO would be FIRED

Source: https://t.co/cKIVQXowBu
